      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>mats_325</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Tablas y expresiones algebraicas</string>
            <string language="en">Tables and algebraic terms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tabellen und algebraische Bezeichnungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableaux et limites algébriques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tabelas e termos algébricos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tabelle e termini algebrici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίνακες και αλγεβρικοί όροι</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las relaciones entre las gráficas de funciones y sus expresiones algebraicas. Se estudian e interpretan diferentes gráficas que se van relacionando con sus fórmulas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the correspondence between the graphs of functions and their algebraic expressions. Various graphs are studied and interpreted and the relation with their formulae is explained.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ejes</string>
            <string language="en">axes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">interpretación</string>
            <string language="en">interpretation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tabla</string>
            <string language="en">table</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">fórmula</string>
            <string language="en">formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graphs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Korrespondenz zwischen den Diagrammen von Funktionen
und ihren algebraischen Ausdrücken zu studieren. Verschiedene 
Diagramme werden studiert und gedeutet und die Relation mit ihren 
Formeln wird erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier la correspondance entre les graphiques des 
fonctions et leurs expressions algébriques. De divers 
graphiques sont étudiés et interprété et la relation avec leurs 
formules est expliquée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar a 
correspondência entre os gráficos das funções e suas expressões 
algébricas. Os vários gráficos são estudados e interpretado 
e a relação com suas fórmulas é explicada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni studiare
la corrispondenza fra i grafici delle funzioni e le loro espressioni 
algebriche. I vari grafici sono studiati ed interpretato ed il 
rapporto con le loro formule è spiegato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την αλληλογραφία μεταξύ των γραφικών παραστάσεων
των λειτουργιών και των αλγεβρικών εκφράσεών τους. Οι 
διάφορες γραφικές παραστάσεις μελετώνται και ερμηνεύονται και η 
σχέση με τους τύπους τους εξηγείται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
